plot: A summer spent racing with a Top Fuel "Nostalgia" Drag Racing Team. A group of guys work on their dragster and race it at tracks across the Western United States; recapturing the glory days of Drag Racing; with both success and failure.
title: Fast Lane Summer
plot_es: A summer spent racing with a Top Fuel "Nostalgia" Drag Racing Team. A group of guys work on their dragster and race it at tracks across the Western United States; recapturing the glory days of Drag Racing; with both success and failure.
plot_en: A summer spent racing with a Top Fuel "Nostalgia" Drag Racing Team. A group of guys work on their dragster and race it at tracks across the Western United States; recapturing the glory days of Drag Racing; with both success and failure.
